name: Party Panic!
description:
Party Panic is a multiplayer party game developed by a team of three students as their final project. The game features a main board and various mini-games that players compete in to earn gems, keys, and power-ups. The ultimate goal is to have the most keys and stars at the end of the game to win.

Players  navigate through the game's levels and compete in mini-games. The levels are designed to challenge players and are filled with gems, keys, and power-ups that players can collect to gain an advantage.

The mini-games are fast-paced and varied, ranging from races to puzzles to battles, each with its own set of rules and objectives. Players must use their skills and strategies to outplay their opponents and come out on top.

Party Panic also features a shop where players can spend their hard-earned gems on items and keys to help them progress through the game. Additionally, the game includes an achievement system, allowing players to track their progress and earn rewards for completing certain challenges.

With its colorful and engaging visuals, intuitive gameplay, and diverse range of mini-games, Party Panic is the perfect game to play with friends and family at any party or gathering.
